description: This table contains the comments when an imaging physician determines a study as interesting.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for interesting study comments associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INT_STUDY_COMMENT
columns.description: Free text comments made by the physician for an interesting study.
